A lot of twists and deaths. I feel like: I just loved it. It brought a new perspective to the story. It stepped out of the hero's journey and slapped us in the face with the truth about \"heroes\". Luke was a super interesting character and Yoda's cameo was heart warming. And they are assuming things that Lucas never dared to do (And I'm not talking about camera angles) like the diverse uses of the force be it on combat or on conecting with their surroundings. Looking forward for the third one.
